name: Molly Brodak
bio: Molly Brodak is the author of Bandit: A Daughter’s Memoir (Grove Atlantic, 2016) and A Little Middle of the Night (University of Iowa Press, 2010). Brodak's poems appeared widely, including in Granta, Poetry magazine, Fence, Map Literary, New York Tyrant, Diode, New Orleans Review, Ninth Letter, Colorado Review, Bateau, and Hayden's Ferry Review. She died in early 2020.
